serverams33.name: ${random_pet.serverams33ams3.id}
serverams33.user_data:
#!/bin/bash
apt-get update
apt-get install -y unzip curl jq dnsutils
useradd --system --home /etc/consul.d --shell /bin/false consul
mkdir -p /etc/consul.d
chown root:root /etc/consul.d
chmod 0755 /etc/consul.d
mkdir -p /opt/consul
chown consul:consul /opt/consul
chmod 0755 /opt/consul
curl -L https://releases.hashicorp.com/consul/1.7.1/consul_1.7.1_linux_amd64.zip -o /tmp/consul-1.7.1.zip
chown root:root /tmp/consul-1.7.1.zip
chmod 0644 /tmp/consul-1.7.1.zip
unzip -x /tmp/consul-1.7.1.zip -d /usr/local/bin
rm /tmp/consul-1.7.1.zip
consul -autocomplete-install
complete -C /usr/local/bin/consul consul
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/systemd/network/consul0.netdev
# Creates a "dummy" network interface
# we'll configure this interface with a link-local address
# See: https://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/systemd.netdev.html
##

[NetDev]
Name=consul0
Kind=dummy

FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/systemd/network/consul0.netdev
chmod 0644 /etc/systemd/network/consul0.netdev
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/systemd/network/consul0.network
# We "find" the dummy0 interface we created and configure it with a link-local address
# See: https://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/systemd.network.html
##
[Match]
Name=consul0

[Network]
Address=169.254.1.1/32

# We want these domains
Domains= ~pco.nf.

# To go to the consul DNS server we'll bind to this address
DNS=169.254.1.1

FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/systemd/network/consul0.network
chmod 0644 /etc/systemd/network/consul0.network
systemctl restart systemd-networkd
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/consul.d/config.hcl
ui = true
bind_addr = "0.0.0.0"
advertise_addr = "{{GetPublicIP}}"
datacenter = "ams3"
data_dir = "/opt/consul"
domain = "pco.nf"
FILE_CONTENT
chown consul:consul /etc/consul.d/config.hcl
chmod 0640 /etc/consul.d/config.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/consul.d/server.hcl
server = true
bootstrap_expect = 3
FILE_CONTENT
chown consul:consul /etc/consul.d/server.hcl
chmod 0640 /etc/consul.d/server.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/protoconf.crt
${tls_self_signed_cert.root.cert_pem}
FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/protoconf.crt
chmod 0644 /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/protoconf.crt
update-ca-certificates
mkdir -p /etc/consul.d/tls
chown root:root /etc/consul.d/tls
chmod 0755 /etc/consul.d/tls
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/consul.d/tls/key.pem
${tls_private_key.serverams33_consul.private_key_pem}
FILE_CONTENT
chown consul:consul /etc/consul.d/tls/key.pem
chmod 600 /etc/consul.d/tls/key.pem
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/consul.d/tls/cert.pem
${tls_locally_signed_cert.serverams33_consul.cert_pem}
FILE_CONTENT
chown consul:consul /etc/consul.d/tls/cert.pem
chmod 0644 /etc/consul.d/tls/cert.pem
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/consul.d/tls.hcl
key_file = "/etc/consul.d/tls/key.pem"
cert_file = "/etc/consul.d/tls/cert.pem"
ca_file = "/usr/local/share/ca-certificates/protoconf.crt"
addresses {
    https = "0.0.0.0"
    dns = "169.254.1.1"
}
ports {
    https = 8501
    dns = 53
}
recursors = ["127.0.0.53"]

FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/consul.d/tls.hcl
chmod 0644 /etc/consul.d/tls.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/consul.d/join_lan.hcl
retry_join = ["provider=digitalocean api_token=${var.digitalocean_token} region=ams3 tag_name=server"]
FILE_CONTENT
chown consul:consul /etc/consul.d/join_lan.hcl
chmod 0640 /etc/consul.d/join_lan.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/systemd/system/consul.service
[Unit]
After=network-online.target
Description=HashiCorp Consul - A service mesh solution
Documentation=https://www.consul.io/
Requires=network-online.target
[Service]
AmbientCapabilities=CAP_NET_BIND_SERVICE
ExecReload=/usr/local/bin/consul reload
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/consul agent -config-dir=/etc/consul.d/
Group=consul
KillMode=process
LimitNOFILE=65536
Restart=on-failure
Type=notify
User=consul
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/systemd/system/consul.service
chmod 0644 /etc/systemd/system/consul.service
systemctl start consul
systemctl enable consul
apt-get install -y apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl gnupg-agent software-properties-common
curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add -
sudo add-apt-repository  "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable" 
apt-get update
apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
mkdir -p /etc/nomad.d
chown root:root /etc/nomad.d
chmod 700 /etc/nomad.d
mkdir -p /opt/nomad
chown root:root /opt/nomad
chmod 0755 /opt/nomad
curl -L https://releases.hashicorp.com/nomad/0.10.4/nomad_0.10.4_linux_amd64.zip -o /tmp/nomad-0.10.4.zip
chown root:root /tmp/nomad-0.10.4.zip
chmod 0644 /tmp/nomad-0.10.4.zip
unzip -x /tmp/nomad-0.10.4.zip -d /usr/local/bin
rm /tmp/nomad-0.10.4.zip
nomad -autocomplete-install
complete -C /usr/local/bin/nomad nomad
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/nomad.d/nomad.hcl
data_dir = "/opt/nomad"
FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/nomad.d/nomad.hcl
chmod 0644 /etc/nomad.d/nomad.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/nomad.d/datacenter.hcl
datacenter = "ams3"
FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/nomad.d/datacenter.hcl
chmod 0644 /etc/nomad.d/datacenter.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/nomad.d/client.hcl
client {
  enabled = true
}

FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/nomad.d/client.hcl
chmod 0644 /etc/nomad.d/client.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/nomad.d/server.hcl
server {
  enabled = true
  bootstrap_expect = 3
}

FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/nomad.d/server.hcl
chmod 0644 /etc/nomad.d/server.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/nomad.d/99-additional-configs.hcl
advertise {
    http = "{{GetPublicIP}}"
    rpc = "{{GetPublicIP}}"
    serf = "{{GetPublicIP}}"
}

FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/nomad.d/99-additional-configs.hcl
chmod 0644 /etc/nomad.d/99-additional-configs.hcl
cat <<FILE_CONTENT | tee /etc/systemd/system/nomad.service
[Unit]
Description=nomad
Documentation=http://localhost
[Service]
ExecReload=/bin/kill -HUP $MAINPID
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/nomad agent -config /etc/nomad.d
KillMode=process
KillSignal=SIGINT
LimitNOFILE=infinity
LimitNPROC=infinity
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=2
StartLimitBurst=3
StartLimitIntervalSec=10
TasksMax=infinity
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
FILE_CONTENT
chown root:root /etc/systemd/system/nomad.service
chmod 0644 /etc/systemd/system/nomad.service
systemctl start nomad
systemctl enable nomad
